projects.title: Which key steering principles determine the success of an IT project
projects.description: This is a group project cooperated with Logica Consultant in The Netherlands with study case MSi and it's S-ERP system. profile_positions.description:
Focus on prepared and generated detail financial reports of AVA group members (Benelux, Austria, Italy, UK, France, Denmark and Poland) such as; Balance Sheet, Income Statement, Trial Balance, Direct and Indirect Cash Flows included analysis financial reports every month for CEO of AVA group, CFO headquarter and other management.

•	Improved reporting process by building-up standard financial reports with Ms. Excel integrated formula for all of AVA group subsidiaries according IFRS and/or US GAAP.
•	Provided detail consolidation report of AVA Group every month for CEO and CFO, included performance analysis of each subsidiary.
•	Ensured smoothly quarterly and yearly audit process conducted by an external auditor, such as; answered auditor’s question, stock-taking, provided all the reports needed and made correction/revision booking.
•	Produced insight analysis reports of subsidiaries’ performance based on their sales, purchase and inventory turnover, managed cash forecast and monitored budget.
profile_positions.title: Accounting Specialist and Reporting

profile_positions.description:
Conducted the whole process of finance and accounting using Excel, ERP and Oracle R12 systems; started with processing and controlling invoices and credit notes, bank reconciliation and booking into the systems, preparing and generating financial reports, reviewing and analyzing financial figures, until providing advice and recommendations to management. A key role to support Sales Department by managing and assisting more than 200 customers/distributors of MSI all over Europe.

• Booked GL, AR/AP accounts, prepared financial report BS and IS, corrected error on the annual report and created journal adjustments for year-end closing.
•Created AR revaluation, Bank Revaluation, and Cash-Flow journals for month end closing using  
   Oracle and ERP system.
• Supported auditor on year-end audit regarding bank transactions, sales, AR/AP, stocks, and supporting documents.
• Prepared, calculated and reported Omzetbelasting (BTW),  Intracommunautaire Prestaties (ICP), and Centraal Bureau voor de Statistiek report (CBS) using excel and online software. 
• Cooperated with Sales department and Logistic department to push sales and solved customers’ payments problem.
• Negotiated/communicated with credit insurance company to increase/reduce customers’ credit by analyzing and discussing customers’ financial figures.
• Analyzed and calculated sales turnover based on credit insurance contract agreement. These reports were used by management to make a decision of new contract agreements.
• Developed strong relationship with MSi customers all over Europe, assisted and solved all customers’ issue related to payments (AR).
• Prepared and calculated bad debt provision report, NRV and Obsolete stocks report.
• Controlled and processed sales invoices, orders released until the goods shipped to customers.
• Coached other Finance colleagues and assistants with Microsoft Excel, ERP, Oracle and new areas of work.
profile_positions.title: Accounting & Finance Officer

profile_positions.description:
Managed designers’ projects, controlled and monitored Petty Cash, bank reconciliation, handled bookkeeping and provided reports to the mother company using FoxPro system, calculated and generated tax report for authorities. 

•	Performed bank reconciliation as daily task; maintained company’s bank accounts and made cash flow projection based on project contracts from designers, prepared AP and AR reports to support manager and Head of Project to make the proper decision.
•	Controlled and monitored Petty Cash, Account Receivables and Account Payable and input daily transactions to the system in order supporting budget process. 
•	Calculated Income tax and VAT, prepared annual tax reports and filled-in supporting documents to process the payments.
profile_positions.title: Accounting & Tax staff

Supported Finance department as cashier and  Re-insurance staff, booked transactions and maintained re-insurance data using Oracle system, supported Marketing and Claim department by ensuring timely payments process and completeness documents.

•	Updated daily cash transaction to the system and ensured timely reports to Accounting Department.
•	Liaised with Marketing Department, Claim Department and other insurance companies local and international to collect, maintained and updated the reinsurance data in the system.  
•	Analyzed and made reconciliation account to provide periodic reports of R/I Facultative and Treaty in order to support Finance department as part of the process reinsurance payments.    
•	Performed administrative tasks in Finance Department such as prepared cheques and supporting documents for payments, organized invoices and vouchers, batch journals and filling other documents.
